comments: Number of 12-subsequences of [ 1, n ] with just 1 contiguous pair.120288*a(n) is the number of permutations of (n+1) symbols that 10-commute with an (n+1)-cycle (see A233440 for definition), where 120288 = A000757(10). - _Luis Manuel Rivera Mart√≠nez_, Feb 07 2014
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 9..1000
Luis Manuel Rivera, Integer sequences and k-commuting permutations, arXiv preprint arXiv:1406.3081, 2014
formula: G.f.: (10+x)*x^9/(1-x)^12.a(n) = C(n+1, 10)*C(n+1, 1). - _Zerinvary Lajos_, Jun 08 2005, corrected by _R. J. Mathar_, Feb 13 2016
author: Thi Ngoc Dinh (via _R. K. Guy_)
